name: cerb.editor.toolbar.wrapSelection
description: Wrap selected text using `start_with` and `end_with` sequences
script:
inputs:
  text/start_with:
    required@bool: true
  text/end_with:

start:
  return:
    snippet@text:
      {{inputs.start_with}}{{caller_params.selected_text}}{{inputs.end_with|default(inputs.start_with)}}
